title: Basic Usage
content: Note that the Roles component requests mock data. Use real services during development. The change(userId) interface is used to listen to the switchover event. The input parameter is the user ID after the switchover.
findIntroStr: Roles role component, which provides the role list of the current user and allows users to switch between roles.

title: Customized Query Service
content: Note that the Roles component requests mock data. Use real services during development. Use fetch-role to customize the query service.
findIntroStr: Roles role component, which provides the role list of the current user and allows users to switch between roles.
